generatedTitle: what is the cause of anemia in alcoholics

extractFactDictList.question: What percentage of people with ALD suffer from anemia?
extractFactDictList.sentence: In fact, anemia is one of the most common complications of ALD, affecting up to 50% of individuals with the condition.

extractFactDictList.question: How many of the main mechanisms of the liver's damage is caused by alcohol?
extractFactDictList.sentence: One of the main mechanisms is the destruction of red blood cells, which occurs due to the toxic effects of alcohol on the liver.
